sub_title: Creative Copywriter | SEO Content Writer | English & Italian Transcreator
summary:
Ciao! Hello! Hoi!

I am a native Italian (ü§å) and a professional English speaker, (SEO) copywriter, and creative.
I have a bachelor's in philosophy and am completing my master's in the same subject.

I have had multiple international experiences within Europe‚Äîworkshops, an Erasmus research traineeship, and an internship at Media.Monks, among others.
At Media.Monks, I was part of the large HP client team. Nevertheless, the projects I was involved in allowed me to experiment with different styles and TOV, adapting the content to the target audience and media. I've written scripts, social posts, headlines, banners, and so on.
In the last year, I worked on the Italian localization of a Dutch e-shop, achieving compelling results in terms of SEO and sales.

Now I live in Noord-Holland. In my spare time, I stretch the possibilities of language by writing poems.

Do you want to collaborate? ü§ù
Hit my message box! üì¨

At RR Commerce, my role has been translating and optimizing product descriptions and content of the newborn e-commerce www.coverdirect.it for the Italian market.

RESPONSIBILITIES
- Conducting SEO research to unveil the most used keywords.
- Localizing the e-commerce website (preexisting content and UX writing) for the Italian market.
- Writing new content and product descriptions embedding searched keywords.
- Responsible for the link-building campaign to increment the Domain Authority of the webshop.
- Advising on marketing strategy, unique KSPs, and Italian consumer habits.
- Analyzing data from Content King, AhRefs, Majestic, Moz, Mangools, and others to define SEO Strategies.', 'title': 'SEO Specialist & Content Writer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 46926, 'name': 'Media.Monks', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQFgNggAZFKBbw/company-logo_400_400/0/1686628708485?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=naQqRiEnpVsPtBFXdKMoOKfGKbflKND8-5_f5MbN__s', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mediamonks/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Hilversum, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Media.Monks', 'description': "Media.Monks is a digital marketing and advertising services company connecting the dots across content, data & digital media, and technology services.

During this internship I became part of the Copy Team based in the Media.Monks HQ.
In particular, I worked within a team dedicated to a whopper brand.

RESPONSABILITIES
 - writing clear and compelling copy for digital products, advertising and marketing of leading agencies and brands: headlines and UI copy to social posts, TVC scripts, marketing content, virtual assistants, and project cases.
- Writing and editing for pitches and projects in production alike.
- Developing creative approaches to answer clients' briefs.
- Collaborating with designers to align written and visual experiences/content.
- Giving critical and constructive feedback to coworkers.", 'title': 'Creative Copywriting Intern', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 114191, 'name': 'Donders Institute for Brain, Cognition and Behaviour', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQHc6MeMskP9-w/company-logo_400_400/0/1686666031946?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=IjWoDV-EdREFGGZZEi5YLu-YKHXYc_c7FRQ3fkEjYhU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/donders-institute-for-brain-cognition-and-behaviour-centre-for-cognitive-neuroimaging/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Nijmegen, Gelderland Province, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Donders Institute for Brain, Cognition, and Behaviour', 'description': 'The Donders Institute for Brain, Cognition and Behaviour is a world-class research centre devoted to understanding the mechanistic underpinnings of human cognition and behaviour in health and disease.
